mapper.select: select * from post_info p, user_info u where p.u_email = u.u_email order by post_dt desc
select * from post_info p, user_info u where p.u_email = u.u_email and p.u_email = #{u_email} order by post_dt desc
select * from post_info p, user_info u where p.u_email = u.u_email and p.post_seq in (select post_seq from bookmark_info where u_email=#{u_email} ) order by post_dt desc

select distinct * from post_info p, user_info u where post_seq in (select post_seq from post_level where tag_seq||tag_level in ( select tag_seq||tag_level from user_level where u_email=#{u_email})) and post_seq in (select post_seq from post_tag where tag_seq in (select tag_seq from user_tag where u_email=#{u_email})) and p.u_email = u.u_email order by post_dt desc
select distinct * from post_info p, user_info u where post_seq in (select post_seq from post_tag where tag_seq=#{tag_seq}) and p.u_email = u.u_email order by post_dt desc
select * from post_info p, user_info u where p.u_email=u.u_email and p.post_kind=#{post_kind}
mapper.insert: insert into post_info values( post_info_seq.nextval, #{post_title}, #{post_content}, #{post_file, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate, #{u_email}, 0, 0, #{post_kind}, 0, 0 )
